newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Lorry seized smuggling 52 Kurds into Germany.
newsitem.headline: Lorry seized smuggling 52 Kurds into Germany.

text.p: Fifty-two Kurds were planning to seek asylum in Austria on Wednesday after border police prevented them entering Germany illegally, state radio reported.
The Kurds, hidden in the back of a Turkish heavy goods vehicle, were spotted late on Tuesday as they tried to cross into Bavaria from Neuhaus in the western province of Upper Austria.

They had been on the road for six days, radio said. Austrian authorities transferred the Kurds to the gymnasium of a school in nearby Suben. Bavarian police took the Turkish lorry driver into custody.
